reviews.review_msg: His exams were easy but irrelated to the course. Don't need any math skill to pass his course. Do not expect to learn anything from him. He is not a good prof.

Numerous students are dissatisfied with this course, but perhaps we should direct our anger towards the TA, not the professor. The word "harsh" is not enough to describe the TA. I have never spent so much time on an assignment only to receive 10%. On the other hand, I find Torsten genuinely interested in the course material, smart, & helpful.

Does a good job teaching a very tough course, this should not be a 3 credit course!  Has an extreme interest in the course material, thinks about what he says and can respond to difficult questions.  Coming out of this course, I felt comfortable enough to reimplement most of the algorithms discussed
The project had nothing to do with the class. He was just re-reading the book to us off his slides. Didn't learn any practical skills in animation just howto use maya which we taught ourselves.
i wouldn't complain if it were a 5 credit course

This is probably one of the best professor I ever had. It's true that his assignments are huge :P
 But still, if you are interested in the topic you can learn a lot from his classes. Also the midterms/finals are almost impossible to finish in the assigned time and contain elements not presented in class, but, hey!, he normalizes marks so who cares!
